channel.title: CVE Feed for webshouter -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for webshouter -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4963|2024-08-02T07:44:53.585Z -- webshouter -- ws%20facebook%20like%20box%20widget
item.description: The WS Facebook Like Box Widget for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'ws-facebook-likebox' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 5.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
